name: Note Board - Sticky Notes App
summary: Sticky notes extension with undisclosed Amazon affiliate link injection. Automatically modifies user-created Amazon links to include developer's affiliate tags (notboa-20, notboa-21, wwwnoteboarda-21) for US, Spain, and UK Amazon domains.

vulnerabilities.title: Amazon Affiliate Link Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Silently injects affiliate tags into Amazon links created by users in their notes for amazon.com, amazon.es, and amazon.co.uk.

flags.description: Undisclosed Amazon affiliate tag injection on user-created links for amazon.com (notboa-20), amazon.es (notboa-21), amazon.co.uk (wwwnoteboarda-21)
